name: PlotLocalSensitivity
description:
Calculates and plots the local sensitivity of a given target (performance attribute) w.r.t. a specific design (sample). 
Requires a dataset and a trained model to be loaded.

inputParameters.name: target_name
inputParameters.description: Name of a target performance attribute.

inputParameters.name: sample
inputParameters.description: List of design parameters for a single sample, each formatted as a string with the following format: 'variable_name:value'.

inputParameters.name: plot
inputParameters.description: Set to True to calculate and plot the local sensitivity.
